front.title: Fast and accurate multigrid solution of Poissons equation using diagonally oriented grids
front.abstract: We solve Poisson’s equation using new multigrid algorithms that converge rapidly. The novel feature of the two- and three-dimensional algorithms is the use of extra diagonal grids in the multigrid hierarchy for richer and more effective communication between levels. Numerical experiments for Poisson’s equation in the unit square and unit cube show that simple versions of the proposed algorithms are up to twice as fast as correspondingly simple multigrid iterations on conventional grid hierarchies.
